original: 精研五術，練精氣神，斷欲行善，致童顏鶴髮乃至發起神通。武將能力不受年齡衰老、不受毒殺、亦不折壽，凡斬首即遁走！只有當天命之日到來時，才會壽終正寢。
text: Intensively study the five skills, practice the spirit of energy and spirit, cut off the desire to do good, and even initiate supernatural powers. The generals' abilities are not subject to age, aging, poisoning, and life expectancy. Everyone who beheaded will escape! Only when the fate of the day comes will the end of life come to an end.
